tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE protein_interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_a VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    protein_b VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE protein_interaction (id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein1 TEXT, protein2 TEXT, interaction_type TEXT); CREATE TABLE drug_target (id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein_id INT, target_type TEXT);

CREATE TABLE proteins (
  protein_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_id_1 INT NOT NULL,
  protein_id_2 INT NOT NULL,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE drug_targets (
  drug_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE Protein (protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein_name VARCHAR(50), protein_function VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE Interaction (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, protein_id1 INT, protein_id2 INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE Target (target_id INT PRIMARY KEY, target_name VARCHAR(50), target_function VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE Drug (drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_name VARCHAR(50), drug_type VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE Drug_Target (drug_id INT, target_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (drug_id, target_id))
